channel.title: Recipe For Success with Miles Kubheka
channel.managingEditor: recipe-for-success@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Miles Kubheka | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
channel.description:
Miles Kubheka, the big, big dreamer and founder of Wakanda - Food Forever, talks to experts and specialists in the Entrepreneurial Ecosystem to help people better understand, and navigate, this challenging and rewarding space.

Recorded and produced at https://SolidGoldStudios.co.za #BeHeard

image.title: Recipe For Success with Miles Kubheka

channel.itunes:subtitle: Conversations to help you understand and navigate the entrepreneurial ecosystem.

item.title: Tea Lady | Retang Phaahla (Setsong | Founder)
item.itunes:title: Tea Lady | Retang Phaahla (Setsong | Founder)
item.itunes:subtitle: Indigenous Tea Discoveries
item.description:
Meet the founder of Setšong tea and learn about the challenges she's overcome in building this amazing indigenous tea business.


Connect with Retang on LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/in/retang-phaahla-561455179/

Setsong - Indigenous Tea Discoveries https://setsong.co.za/

Music Used : Dyalla - Let's Go Out | Mouse Music


Wakanda - Food Forever https://wakanda.org.za

More about Miles https://mileskubheka.com/


If you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za

item.title: Something with a Twyst | Sammy Mhaule (Skyrule Drinks | Founder)
item.itunes:title: Something with a Twyst | Sammy Mhaule (Skyrule Drinks | Founder)
item.itunes:subtitle: Following your dreams, no matter what
item.description:
Skyrule Drinks (a popular craft soft drink) founder, Sammy Mhaule, shares his entrepreneurial journey with us.


Skyrule Twyst is a sparkling juice range with a difference https://www.skyruledrinks.com/

Connect with Sammy Mhaule on LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/in/sammy-mhaule-4a9aa1b8/

Music Used : Dyalla - Let's Go Out | Mouse Music


Wakanda - Food Forever https://wakanda.org.za

More about Miles https://mileskubheka.com/
